## Protocol.DOMSnapshot.DOMNode.layoutNodeIndex property

The index of the node's related layout tree node in the `layoutTreeNodes` array returned by `getSnapshot`<!-- -->, if any.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
layoutNodeIndex?: integer;
```
